---
title: "Ricci static"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

source("process.R")

make_plot <- function(d) {
  ggplot(d, aes(kappa, color=t1_nwk)) + 
    facet_wrap(~ dist, ncol=2, scales="free") + theme(aspect.ratio=0.62) +
    geom_density()
}

analyze <- function(path) {
  d <- get_results(path)
  make_plot(d)
}
```
